correction_note: CORRECTED FINAL RANKINGS using REAL Yahoo Finance technical data (verified against KLSE app)

scoring_methodology.fundamental_source: 3-5 years historical financial data from Bursa Malaysia filings
scoring_methodology.technical_source: Yahoo Finance 1-year daily price data (verified against KLSE app)

rank_reasons: Best banking fundamentals: 0.89% NPL (industry-leading), 18.8% net margin, 16.2% CET1 capital ratio
Solid technical setup: Tight consolidation at RM4.25 with bullish MACD crossover
High volume accumulation (89% above average) suggests institutional buying
Excellent risk/reward: 4.7% stop loss offers tight downside protection
Conservative banking model provides downside protection for medium-risk profile
final_rankings.allocation_rationale: Largest allocation given best fundamentals, low technical risk (4.7%), and defensive characteristics. Core holding for medium-risk portfolio.

rank_reasons: Malaysia's largest bank with unparalleled liquidity and market dominance
STRONGEST technical setup: Price above all SMAs in proper alignment, +9% from 52w low
Improving ROE trend (10.2% to 11.8%) shows management focus on efficiency
Strong dividend yield (5.2%) with ASEAN diversification
Low technical risk (4.4% stop) with clear uptrend momentum
final_rankings.allocation_rationale: Ranked #2 despite lower fundamental score due to SUPERIOR technical setup (7.6 vs 6.8). Strongest uptrend with confirmed momentum. Malaysia's banking leader offers liquidity and stability.

rank_reasons: Highest dividend yield (5.5%) among all candidates - excellent income generation
Strong uptrend: +21.8% from 52w low with price above all SMAs
ASEAN diversification reduces Malaysia-specific concentration
Improving ROE (9.8% to 10.8%) and investment banking strength
Bullish RSI (62.22) with healthy consolidation
final_rankings.allocation_rationale: Strong technical setup (7.5 score) with highest dividend yield (5.5%). ASEAN exposure diversifies geographic risk. Income-focused allocation.

rank_reasons: Best efficiency ratio (38% C/I) with 17.8% net margin - operational excellence

Focused SME banking strategy with loyal customer base

Accelerating growth (14.2% CAGR, 18.5% YoY Q3) with excellent ROE (16.4%)
RF/optical semiconductor leader benefiting from 5G and data center trends

Gas monopoly with fortress competitive position
